title: Irma's Sandwich Shop
description: Who can resist a customized sandwich? This book takes the reader to Irma's Sandwich Shop, where Irma makes sandwiches for all of her customers, whether they're little boys or vultures. Humorous illustrations support the text.
highFrequencyWords: horseradish, impressive, ingredients, opossum, patiently, pumpernickel, rancid, Reuben, rye, sauerkraut, tasty
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ee, ea, and ie
awareness: Possessive Nouns                : Recognize and use possessive nouns
phonics: Bold Print                : Understand the purpose of bold print in text
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
